author: Denny Page
releaseNotes:
4.1.0: Clarify InfluxDB Version as referring to Write Protocol Version
4.0.1: When debugging, log individual fields of device and variable events
4.0.0:
 Add failsafe call to writeQueuedDataToInfluxDb when new events are queued
 Remove migration support for versions prior to 3.0.0
3.3.2: Add warning about special characters in Database, Org and Bucket names
3.3.1: Remove default values for Influx Version and Authorization Type
3.3.0: Add support for Hub Variables
